question: Format answer for: Regarding patient 'CII-3' from family 'Family C': What functional evidence supports the pathogenicity of the second mutation?
context:
The provided document states the following regarding patients carrying the p.D620N mutation (which includes patient CII-3):
"Patients carrying the p.D620N mutation did not have any other variants in all exons of VPS35." (Page 3, left column, first full paragraph).

This indicates that, according to the screening performed in this study, patient CII-3, who has the p.D620N mutation, does not have a "second mutation" within the exons of the VPS35 gene. Therefore, the document does not contain information about functional evidence supporting the pathogenicity of a second mutation for patient CII-3.

Information not found.
